mapper.update:
UPDATE fms_ord_renewal
RENEWAL_STATUS = #{renewalStatus},
${renewalStatusColumn} = #{renewalStatus},
${currencyColumn} = #{currency},
${renewalFlagColumn} = #{renewalFlag},
${renewalDateColumn} = #{renewalDate},
WHERE TYPE = "ITEM" AND ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
mapper.select:
SELECT
CASE WHEN fpi.ITEM_NAME IS NULL THEN '总计' ELSE fpi.ITEM_NAME END ITEM_NAME, foo.PAY_PERIODS FROM fms_ord_renewal FOOR LEFT JOIN fms_prd_items fpi ON FOOR.ITEM_ID = fpi.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN fms_ord_order AS foo ON FOOR.ORDER_ID = foo.ORDER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND FOOR.ORDER_ID = #{orderId , jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT
CASE WHEN fpi.ITEM_NAME IS NULL THEN '总计' ELSE fpi.ITEM_NAME END ITEM_NAME, foo.PAY_PERIODS FROM fms_ord_renewal FOOR LEFT JOIN fms_prd_items fpi ON FOOR.ITEM_ID = fpi.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN fms_ord_order AS foo ON FOOR.ORDER_ID = foo.ORDER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND FOOR.ORDER_ID = #{orderId , jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND FOOR.RENEWAL_ID = #{renewalId , jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND FOOR.ITEM_ID = #{itemId , jdbcType=DECIMAL}
